title: Google\Cloud\GkeBackup\V1\RestoreConfig\ClusterResourceRestoreScope
name: ClusterResourceRestoreScope
description:
Identifies the cluster-scoped resources to restore from the Backup.

Generated from protobuf message google.cloud.gkebackup.v1.RestoreConfig.ClusterResourceRestoreScope

Extends Google\Protobuf\Internal\Message

params.name: data
params.description: Optional. Data for populating the Message object.

params.name: data.selected_group_kinds
params.description: A list of "types" of cluster-scoped resources to be restored from the Backup. An empty list means that NO cluster-scoped resources will be restored. Note that Namespaces and PersistentVolume restoration is handled separately and is not governed by this field.

methods.name: getSelectedGroupKinds
methods.description:
